mapper.select: SELECT o.id id, o.house_id houseId, o.name name, o.idcard idcard, o.birthday birthday, o.profession profession, o.sex sex, o.type type, o.picture picture, o.telephone telephone, o.remark remark, o.version version, date_format(b.gmt_create, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtCreate, date_format(b.gmt_modified, '%Y-%m-%d %T') gmtModified FROM tb_owner o ORDER BY o.id ASC LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
